summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.34.008, 23.34.024, 23.47.004, 23.47.008, 23.47.009; and adding a new Section 23.34.089 and a new Chapter 23.69, Station Area Overlay District, to the Seattle Municipal Code; to establish a new permanent station area overlay district to prohibit uses incompatible with transit-oriented development and establish development standards supportive of transit-oriented development.
